document_data.name: Miglin Crackedquartz
document_data.Activities: When not acting as a guide, Miglin wandered the city making, notes about the caverns and passages.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], [[Kargien Dissengulp]] sent Miglin to act as a guide for an adventuring party he'd hired in tunnels toward the [[Wormwrithings]].
document_data.Personality: Miglin was a gruff and acerbic individual. He was more interested in gemstones than people, even offering to the people that employed him reports about the various properties of every rock he saw.
